meanings.sent1: She credentialled her employees before allowing them access to sensitive information.
meanings.sent2: The university credentialled him after verifying his academic qualifications.
meanings.sent3: The detective credentialled the suspect before interrogating him, just like in the movies.
meanings.sent4: The passport officer credentialled each traveler meticulously, ensuring no one could pass without proper identification.
meanings.sent5: Credentialled individuals are trusted with important tasks due to their verified qualifications.

meanings.sent1: The credentialled doctor quickly gained the trust of her patients.
meanings.sent2: Only the credentialled professionals were allowed to enter the restricted area.
meanings.sent3: The credentialled chef prepared a meal fit for a king, showcasing his culinary expertise.
meanings.sent4: In the competitive job market, being credentialled can make all the difference in securing a position.
meanings.sent5: The credentialled expert was sought after for her valuable insights in the industry.
